overview: SPECTRUM ADDICT: LOAD "FILM2" is a full-length documentary feature film which takes a detailed look at the ZX Spectrum, its history, developers, games and fans. A tribute to the Sinclair ZX Spectrum, this is the second in a series and further explores the games, hardware, developers, homebrew scene and the future of the next generation... As well as veterans from the first film, we also interview legends such as Mel Croucher (Automata), Jon Ritman (Match Day, Head Over Heels), Gary Bracey (OCEAN Software), Fergus McNeill (Delta4), Nick Roberts (CRASH), Phil South (Your Sinclair) and Lyndon J. Sharp (WASP) amongst many others.
title: Spectrum Addict - Load Film 2
